name: Universe Maker
description:
YOU HAVE THE POWER TO CHANGE THE UNIVERSE

CREATE NEW SOLAR SYSTEMS USING MINI PLANETS

PLACE THE MINI PLANETS IN THE BLUE ORBITS TO BRING BALANCE TO THE GALAXIES

BE CAREFUL TO NOT COLLIDE WITH THE PLANETS IN SPACE

TRY TO BEAT THE 10 LEVELS!

RELAX AND HAVE FUN

BLACKTHORNPROD GAME JAM #2

COMMANDS
MOVE: <>, A D
LAUNCH: SPACE
RESTART: R

CREDITS
KAISH - GAME DEVELOPMENT
EULER MOISES - SOUND TRACK / SFX
